html:
Skip to main content

Yes, due to the Easter Bank Holiday weekend, Royal Mail will not be collecting orders on Good Friday (18/04) or Easter Sunday (20/04). Additionally, our pharmacy team will be closed on Friday 18/04 and Saturday 19/04.

To ensure timely delivery, we may process and ship your order a few days earlier than usual. To avoid any delays over the holiday weekend, you may receive your medication up to 5 days before your usual renewal date. If this happens, you‚Äôll receive an email notification in advance so you have time to reach out if the timing doesn‚Äôt work for you.


How are dispatch dates changing?

üìÖ Date üöö Weight Loss Orders
Tue 15/04 Ship orders due 17/04
Wed 16/04 Ship orders due 18/04 ‚Äì 20/04
Thu 17/04 ‚ùå No orders dispatched
Fri 18/04 ‚ùå Pharmacy closed
Sat 19/04 ‚ùå Pharmacy closed
Sun 20/04 ‚ùå No orders dispatched
Mon 21/04 Ship new orders from 17/04
Tue 22/04 Ship new orders from 18/04 ‚Äì 20/04

Related articles

  • How does my subscription work?
  • General Guidance for Missing Doses
  • What is the treatment titration pathway?
  • How does refer-a-friend work?
  • How does the approval process work?
markdown:
[Skip to main content](https://joinvoy.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/36307449988884-Will-my-Weight-Loss-order-be-affected-by-the-Bank-Holiday#main-content)

Yes, due to the Easter Bank Holiday weekend, **Royal Mail will not be collecting orders on Good Friday (18/04) or Easter Sunday (20/04)**. Additionally, our **pharmacy team will be closed on Friday 18/04 and Saturday 19/04**.

To ensure timely delivery, we may **process and ship your order a few days earlier than usual**. To avoid any delays over the holiday weekend, you **may receive your medication up to 5 days before your usual renewal date**. If this happens, you‚Äôll receive an **email notification in advance** so you have time to reach out if the timing doesn‚Äôt work for you.

### How are dispatch dates changing?

| üìÖ **Date** | üöö **Weight Loss Orders** |
| --- | --- |
| **Tue 15/04** | Ship orders due 17/04 |
| **Wed 16/04** | Ship orders due 18/04 ‚Äì 20/04 |
| **Thu 17/04** | ‚ùå No orders dispatched |
| **Fri 18/04** | ‚ùå Pharmacy closed |
| **Sat 19/04** | ‚ùå Pharmacy closed |
| **Sun 20/04** | ‚ùå No orders dispatched |
| **Mon 21/04** | Ship new orders from 17/04 |
| **Tue 22/04** | Ship new orders from 18/04 ‚Äì 20/04 |
